name: SNEF
description: The Singapore National Employers Federation (SNEF) is the national trade union of employers, representing more than 3,300 employers and the interests of all sectors of the economy. SNEF is the counterpart of the National Trades Union Congress (NTUC). It is an independent, autonomous non-profit organisation funded by membership fees and revenue from consultancy, training, research and other activities. To advance tripartism and enhance labour market flexibility to enable employers to implement responsible employment practices
Headline: Responsible Employers, Sustainable Business
ShortDescription: The Singapore National Employers Federation (SNEF) is the national trade union of employers, representing more than 3,300 employers and the interests of all sectors of the economy.
enhanced_description: The Singapore National Employers Federation (SNEF) is the national trade union of employers, representing over 3,300 employers across all sectors of the economy in Singapore. Positioned as the counterpart to the National Trades Union Congress (NTUC), SNEF operates as an independent, autonomous non-profit organization. Funded by membership fees and revenue from consultancy, training, and research, SNEF's core mission is to advance tripartism and enhance labor market flexibility. Through its services, which include advisory & consultancy, learning & development, benefits administration, and payroll services, SNEF aims to enable employers to implement responsible employment practices, ultimately contributing to improved employee happiness and engagement and fostering sustainable businesses.
key_use_cases: Obtaining expert advisory and consultancy on employment practices and labor relations.
Accessing learning and development programs for HR and management staff.
Ensuring compliance and efficient management of benefits administration services.
Utilizing payroll services for accurate and compliant compensation processing.
Implementing responsible employment practices to enhance workforce well-being and productivity.
Navigating and adapting to changes in labor market regulations and flexibility.
competitive_advantages: Position as the national trade union of employers in Singapore, providing broad representation.
Official counterpart to the National Trades Union Congress (NTUC), underpinning its role in tripartism.
Non-profit, independent, and autonomous structure, fostering trust and employer-centric advocacy.
Comprehensive service offering across advisory, learning, benefits, and payroll.
Deep expertise in Singapore's labor market and employment regulations.
roi_benefits: Enhanced compliance with labor laws and regulations, reducing legal risks.
Improved employee happiness and engagement, potentially leading to higher retention and productivity.
Increased labor market flexibility, allowing businesses to adapt more effectively to economic changes.
Access to expert advice and training, leading to better HR decision-making.
Contribution to fostering sustainable business practices through responsible employment.
compliance_features: Guidance and advisory on Singapore employment laws and regulations.
Support for compliant benefits administration practices.
Advisory on payroll compliance and best practices.
Facilitation of responsible employment practices aligned with national guidelines.
